settings.heading: Request a Price Match
settings.content: Our commitment to our customers includes our price match guarantee. If you come across a lower price from one of our competitors, simply fill out the price match request form below. To be eligible, the product should have the same model barcode/UPC and be currently available in our competitor's inventory.

settings.form_heading: Once you complete and submit this form, our team will reach out to you regarding your price match request.
